description:
AVAILABILITY: This tariff is an optional tariff and is available only to those General Service customers for whom OG&E has installed the applicable technology equipment required for this tariff. Customers with the appropriate equipment will be notified of the availability of the rate. Initially, this tariff will be limited to the number of customers that the Company determines can effectively administered under the constraints of Company's capabilities.

The Company's Rules, Regulations, and Conditions of Service and the Commission's Rules and Regulations apply to service provided under this tariff. This tariff is not available for resale, stand-by, breakdown, or auxiliary service.

DETERMINATION OF ON-PEAK HOURS PRICE: By 5:00 PM on the day prior to each day containing on-peak hours, the Company will issue a price notification to customers. The price is determined based on the Company's day-ahead price calculations as set forth in the DAP Tariff excluding marginal fuel cost. Customers will receive notification of the prices effective during the next day's on-peak period.
energycomments: Adjustments = Fuel Cost adjustment + Demand Program rider + Storm Cost Recovery rider + Smart Grid rider + System Hardening Program rider + Crossroads rider + Southwest Power Pool Cost Tracker + SPP Transmission System Additions rider + Cogeneration Credit + Interim Rates PUD rider  ** Fixed Cost = Customer charge + Annual Public Utility Assessment fee

name: GS-VPP General Service Variable Peak Pricing Pilot
